member.summary: Retrieves the request body as a string. Note that once this method returns, the underlying input stream cannot be read again as it is not rewindable for obvious reasons. This functionality is by design.

member.summary: Retrieves the specified request the header.

member.summary: Determines whether [has request header] [the specified context].

member.summary: Returns dictionary from Request POST data

member.param: if set to true [enable connection watchdog].
Maximum size of the message in bytes. Enter 0 or negative number to prevent checks.

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.Modules.WebSocketsServer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. With dead connection watchdog and no message size checks.

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.Modules.WebSocketsServer.RunConnectionWatchdog
member.summary: Runs the connection watchdog. Removes and disposes stale WebSockets connections every 10 minutes.

member.summary: Accepts the WebSocket connection. This is a blocking call so it must be called within an independent thread.
